name: SnowMaphia 2019
description:
The game is a first person shooter. You are dropped in a snowy city where the houses and hotels are all full of mafia snowmen who want to shoot you down. They threathen the holidays, so be sure to shoot them down and gather all the goodies you can!

Depending on your score you get a luck charm.

Main goal - get as many goodies and shoot down as much snowmen as you can within the time given. 
(Beware of hidden goodies)

Input:

WASD - movement

Shift - run

Mouse - look around and shooting.
